name: Photon (Monzter Games)
description:
Theme:

Life is a maze, where we strive to avert the dead-ends. Photon is a strategical brain-game full of life: avoid the dead ends to survive.

You must collect the luminous “photons” to clear. The light doesn’t shine without the dark, but be careful, danger can be just one step away…

Controls:
  • Left/Right Arrow keys or A/D to move Left/Right.
  • Up/Space bar to jump.
  • Control to shoot.

**NOTE: The game is still in alpha, there may be several bugs which you can report at our Discord server.**
